description: This file is a Gradle build configuration script written in Kotlin DSL for configuring an Android application project with Flutter integration. It specifies plugins, Android build settings, SDK versions, and Flutter source directory.

methods.name: plugins
methods.description: Configuration block declaring Gradle plugins for Android application, Kotlin, and Flutter integration.

methods.name: android
methods.description: Main Android build configuration block, setting namespace, SDK versions, compile options, and build types.

methods.name: compileOptions
methods.description: Specifies Java source and target compatibility versions.

methods.name: defaultConfig
methods.description: Defines default application configuration settings including application ID, SDK versions, and app versioning.

methods.name: buildTypes
methods.description: Configures build types such as release, including signing configurations.
